publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4007.1.1 Elizabeth Smith: Educationâ€”As an amendment to amendment (S3M-4007.1) in the name of Keith Brown, insert at end "and calls on the Scottish Government to bring forward detailed proposals by the start of the 2009-10 academic year as to how it will implement amendment S3M-3164.1, which recognised the need for the Scottish Government to ensure that pupils in Scotland are properly tested in the basic skills of literacy and numeracy by the end of primary 7 and which was given unanimous support by the Parliament on 7 January 2009."
